creator: ljgbpfeiffer@googlemail.com
text:
Hello.
at the time i translate the documentation, i normally check the URLs on the docs.
Here i found that the service is unavailable.
is this web-server maintained by us as ASF? 
Regards.

creator: humbedooh@apache.org
text:
It's not going to be resolved in the near future.
modules.apache.org was a giant spam magnet and thus not something we wanted to keep running. We MAY revive it at a later date, but nothing has been decided
